summary:
OnlyFans is a website where people can make and share paid content. It's mostly used by adults who share adult content, like porn, but others like fitness trainers and musicians also use it. Users can subscribe, tip, or pay per view. The creators earn most of the money.

The platform became very popular during the pandemic, with millions of users and creators. However, there have been concerns about illegal content, like child abuse material, being shared. This led to some debates and investigations, but OnlyFans remains a place for adult content.
title: OnlyFans
